name: gulp-overlay
description: Merge two gulp streams by overlaying one onto the other

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test.js -x test.js --report html -- -R spec
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test.js -x test.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.codacy: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test.js --x test.js -report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/codacy-coverage && rm -rf ./coverage
